item.description:
It's time for something NEW!
No more of the same club nights!
No more Expensive Drinks & Cover!
There is a NEW night in the city!
- Boston's Hottest Crowd
- Sexy Go-Go Dancers
- Exotic Inexpensive Drinks
- Dance Pole

**SPECIAL DRINKS ALL NIGHT**

$5 Martini's
$8 pitchers of beer
$2.50 Drafts
$15 Fish Bowl Special

ALL Ladies FREE Before 11pm on GUEST LIST!

Reduced Cover of $10 otherwise:

For Guestlist Email: Highrollerboston@gmail.com

☆☆ LOCATION ☆☆
183 State Street. Boston, MA
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the bar downstairs between 9:30 - 9:45 PM
item.name: WET SATURDAYS @ GOODBAR. Cheap Drinks/ Fishbowls !! Come Mingle
